definitions.definition: A brightly colored cotton fabric with a checked or striped pattern.
A large handkerchief of this fabric, worn on the head in the West Indies .
Alternative form of Madras ( “ type of curry ” ) .

main_definition: A brightly colored cotton fabric with a checked or striped pattern.
secondary_definitions: A large handkerchief of this fabric, worn on the head in the West Indies .
Alternative form of Madras ( “ type of curry ” ) .
